Introduction

Hi there ! I don’t know if this blog will be updated often but here I go !

What better way to start my blog than by explaning how it works ?

This blog was built using the gatsby-starter-blog starter.
GatsbyJS is a static site generator using the ReactJS framework. This framework allows us to easily deploy our site to various platforms, such as Netlify or in our case GitHub Pages.

Prerequisites

If you want to do the same, here is what you need :

  • A version of Node JS>=8.11.3
  • The Gatsby CLI. Follow the link for instruction on how to install
  • A free GitHub account
